posts.name: srinivas
posts.cooked:
image836×81 8.21 KB

The question indicates that jimmi and soni collaborated on 15 topics and asks for those collaborations which are more than 15.

When i check it, the collaborations between jimmi and soni is zero (0).

Did i understand this right?

posts.name: SM Arif Ali
posts.cooked: Double check the spelling and case. Names are case sensitive.

posts.name: srinivas
posts.cooked:
you are right. Collaboration between jimmi and Soni ( upper case ‘S’) is 15.

But then the answer for ‘collaborator pairs’ > 15 does not match with any choices. I get 90 , but the choices are much higher.

Wonder where i am wrong

posts.name: MAHAJAN KUNAL DEVIDAS
posts.cooked: same hear i got this question iitmanupam and 22f2001362 collaborated on 16 topics. How many pairs of users have collaborated on more topics than they have? i got output 76 , which is not in options

posts.name: SM Arif Ali
posts.cooked: you might be considering (a,b) and (b,a) as same pair, but question treats them as different. So the answer will be double for your case.

posts.name: srinivas
posts.cooked: That is possible. But i feel that may not be correct. bcoz, ‘A collaborating with B’ and ‘B collaborating with A’ are one and the same.

posts.name: Amodh Naik
posts.cooked: You are right, but the question has been designed to consider them differently for some reason. It has been a common issue for dozens, if not all students as far as I can tell. I would consider your answer = half of the choice’s answer.

posts.name: Shivansh Pande
posts.cooked: @AmodhNaik, so are many people facing this issue, the answer we get is half the actual in this?

posts.name: Carlton D'Silva
posts.cooked:
Official Announcement: Answer Scripts for the GAs Tools in Data Science
Dear students, As all the course content has been completed, we have released the answer scripts for the GAs. Please feel free to learn from them. The author of the entire repository is Anand sir. So its a marvelous opportunity to learn from the master. All the code is what he has written for this course. The python files are the answer scripts. And the the javascript files are the question generating scripts. Enjoy!

Please refer to this official announcement.

Kind regards
